2025-12-05.content:
Cloud Workstations predefined images include
[Node.js](https://nodejs.org/) 24 (LTS). The previous version, 20.19.6, is no
longer pre-installed. To continue using a previous version, you can
[customize your container images](https://docs.cloud.google.com/workstations/docs/customize-container-images)
to include it or add a version manager like [NVM](https://www.nvmnode.com/).

summary.title: Node.js 24 LTS Now Available in Cloud Workstations
summary.summary: Cloud Workstations now features Node.js 24 LTS. Previous versions are no longer pre-installed, but can be added via custom container images or version managers.

2025-12-05.content:
Cloud Workstations predefined images include
[Eclipse Temurin](https://adoptium.net/temurin) JDK 21 and 25. JDK 11 is no longer
pre-installed. To continue using JDK 11,
[customize your container images](https://docs.cloud.google.com/workstations/docs/customize-container-images).

summary.title: Cloud Workstations Images Updated
summary.summary: Cloud Workstations now includes Eclipse Temurin JDK 21 and 25. JDK 11 is no longer pre-installed.

2025-07-07.content: Cloud Workstations is available in the `europe-central2` region (Warsaw). For more information, see [Locations](https://cloud.google.com/workstations/docs/locations).

summary.title: Cloud Workstations now in Warsaw
summary.summary: Cloud Workstations is now accessible in the `europe-central2` region, located in Warsaw. For a comprehensive list of available regions, please refer to the documentation.

2025-06-09.content: The JetBrains [readiness server](https://cloud.google.com/workstations/docs/develop-code-using-local-jetbrains-ides#add_a_server_readiness_check) lets you configure the port it listens on and the timeout when you specify the `JETBRAINS_READY_SERVER_PORT` and `JETBRAINS_READY_SERVER_TIMEOUT` environment variables in your workstation environment. For more information about setting environment variables, see [Customizing your environment](https://cloud.google.com/workstations/docs/create-configuration#customize_environment).

summary.title: JetBrains Readiness Server Configuration
summary.summary: You can now configure the JetBrains readiness server port and timeout using environment variables. This allows for greater flexibility in customizing your development environment.

summary.title: CLion Updated to Version 2025.1.1
summary.summary: The JetBrains CLion preconfigured base image has been updated to use CLion 2025.1.1.

summary.title: GoLand Updated to 2025.1.1
summary.summary: The JetBrains GoLand preconfigured base image has been updated to use GoLand 2025.1.1. This update includes the latest features and improvements from JetBrains for Go development.

2025-06-03.content: The [JetBrains IntelliJ Ultimate preconfigured base image](https://cloud.google.com/workstations/docs/preconfigured-base-images#list_of_preconfigured_base_images) uses [IntelliJ-IDEA 2025.1.1](https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/articles/IDEA-A-2100662430/IntelliJ-IDEA-2025.1.1.1-251.25410.129-build-Release-Notes)

summary.title: IntelliJ IDEA base image updated
summary.summary: The IntelliJ IDEA 2025.1.1 preconfigured base image for Cloud Workstations has been updated to the latest version.

summary.title: PhpStorm base image updated
summary.summary: The JetBrains PhpStorm preconfigured base image has been updated to PhpStorm 2025.1.1.

summary.title: WebStorm base image updated
summary.summary: The JetBrains WebStorm preconfigured base image has been updated to use WebStorm version 2025.1.1.

summary.title: RubyMine Updated
summary.summary: The JetBrains RubyMine preconfigured base image has been updated to use RubyMine 2025.1.1.

summary.title: PyCharm base image updated
summary.summary: The JetBrains PyCharm preconfigured base image has been updated to use PyCharm version 2025.1.1.1.

summary.title: Rider base image updated
summary.summary: The JetBrains Rider preconfigured base image has been updated to version 2025.1.2.
